column5: The Cheyenne Lake Cottage is great for weekends at the lake with friends and family. The house is a 15 minute drive to downtown Granbury where you can shop and dine in the historic square. It comfortably sleeps 12 and has a large outdoor patio to enjoy a nice glass of wine, get some sun or take a dip in the canal. The property is almost 1 acre with a large front and back yard in a gated community.
